title: Stamp 1
description: Stamps that show how to make dumplings, with actual instructions written in Chinese integrated into the piece. This is step one -- it teaches you how to make the dough.

title: Stamp 2
description: Stamps that show how to make dumplings, with actual instructions written in Chinese integrated into the piece. This is step two -- it teaches you how to roll out the dough.

title: Stamp 3
description: Stamps that show how to make dumplings, with actual instructions written in Chinese integrated into the piece. This is step three -- it teaches you how to assemble the dumpling.

title: Fallen Angel
description: A movie poster that shows an angel, mistaken as a shooting star, falling down to Earth. The art was drawn on Procreate, then formatted on Photoshop

title: Forgetful
description: An art piece that shows the process of forgetting something. This was drawn purely with Photoshop. I tried to mimic the foggy feeling of forgetting something with the unclear boundaries of the character's legs

title: Fate
description: A movie poster that shows the idea of the red string of fate. The art was drawn on Procreate, then formatted on Photoshop

title: Identity Loss
description: This shows the process of identity loss from the background and foreground. The background shows the character as a normal, hardworking student, which later gets burnt out, shown in the black foreground.

title: Dissociating
description: This art piece shows the process of dissassociating. This shows a character who spills her milk in the morning when she dissociates.
